tasks.title: Investigate ML data collection for ephemeral Claude Code Web environment
tasks.description: Current ML collection assumes persistent environment. In Claude Code Web: 1) Post-commit/pre-push hooks create files but don't persist across sessions, 2) Session tracking needs Stop hook integration, 3) Consider tracking ALL .git-ml/ data in git since user has no privacy concerns. Need to design approach that works for ephemeral environments.

tasks.title: Re-enable and fix git hooks for ML data collection
tasks.description: Hooks disabled due to recurring issues. To fix: 1) Post-commit hook was creating circular commits (partially fixed with skip logic), 2) Pre-push hook may have similar issues, 3) Stop hook integration needed for session capture. Re-enable after proper testing.

tasks.title: Design session capture strategy for Claude Code Web
tasks.description: Need to capture chat/session data for ML training. Options: 1) Integrate with Claude Code Stop hook to write session summaries, 2) Manual session logging commands, 3) Automatic transcript capture if available. Current sessions.jsonl infrastructure exists but isn't being populated.
